java/liquibase/util/StreamUtil.java

00001 package liquibase.util;
00002 
00003 import java.io.*;
00004 
00008 public class StreamUtil {
00009 
00010     public static String getLineSeparator() {
00011         return System.getProperty("line.separator");
00012     }
00013 
00022     public static String getStreamContents(InputStream ins) throws IOException {
00023 
00024         InputStreamReader reader = new InputStreamReader(ins);
00025         return getReaderContents(reader);
00026     }
00027 
00037     public static String getStreamContents(InputStream ins, String charsetName) throws IOException {
00038 
00039         InputStreamReader reader = (charsetName != null) ? new InputStreamReader(ins, charsetName) : new InputStreamReader(ins);
00040         return getReaderContents(reader);
00041     }
00042     
00050     public static String getReaderContents(Reader reader) throws IOException {
00051         try {
00052             StringBuffer result = new StringBuffer();
00053 
00054             char[] buffer = new char[2048];
00055             int read;
00056             while ((read = reader.read(buffer)) > -1) {
00057                 result.append(buffer, 0, read);
00058             }
00059             return result.toString();
00060         } finally {
00061             try {
00062                 reader.close();
00063             } catch (IOException ioe) {//NOPMD
00064                 // can safely ignore
00065             }
00066         }
00067     }
00068 
00069     public static void copy(InputStream inputStream, OutputStream outputStream) throws IOException {
00070         byte[] bytes = new byte[1024];
00071         int r = inputStream.read(bytes);
00072         while (r > 0) {
00073             outputStream.write(bytes, 0, r);
00074             r = inputStream.read(bytes);
00075         }
00076     }
00077 }
